message.body: No major disasters. Belgian caf√© at 8:45?
Yep. all good on my end. I'm about to head home
Sorry struggled with parking. Walking up
thank you for taking the time to see us before driving through the night. Have a safe trip. We all miss you terribly already but will see you soon.... promise
Thank you for coming down to center city! I'll miss you guys a lot, but the guest room is already on its way to being set up and until then, it sounds like maybe I'll see you in Boston :-)
